snippet: The 7-foot Jason Collins, 34, who has yet to be signed by a team since he announced in April that he is gay, could provide smart, positional defense to a club that just lost its center to injury.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column calls on New York Knicks to recruit Jason Collins, talented center who has yet to be signed by a team since he announced in April that he is gay; argues that Collins could provide smart, positional defense for Knicks, who just lost center Tyson Chandler to injury.
lead_paragraph: The 7-foot Jason Collins, 34, who has yet to be signed by a team since he announced in April that he is gay, could provide smart, positional defense to a club that just lost its center to injury.

headline.main: Call Collins? Knicks Have Little to Lose
headline.print_headline: Call Collins? Knicks Have Little to Lose
